name: My Milk Tea Shop
description:
Description: A chill puzzle game. In the game, when the customer makes requests, your task is to mix the ingredients to create a cup of milk tea that matches the customer's requirements.

Note: There may be some errors during the game, but will not affect the gameplay. Please contact me to fix the problems.

If you load the game for the first time, it will take more time than usual.

You can play on a browser or download APK below.

Thank you for watching or playing.
